name: Reserve Pilot (V)
Lore: 'Injuries kept Lord Vader''s best TIE wingman out of the primary wave of starfighters. He remains on reserve duty, ready to replace lost pilots.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting at a system, your total battle destiny here is cumulatively +1. If a battle at a system just ended, may deploy (for free) aboard a starship from which you forfeited a pilot character.',
